TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICheckBoxControl

summary.span: 定义控件实现的属性和事件，用作复选框。

span.span: Defines the property and event a control implements to act as a check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义的属性和事件必须实现用于控件来充当 Web 页上的复选框。The interface defines the property and event that must be implemented for a control to act as a check box on a Web page. 来确定是否选中复选框，或以编程方式设置属性，可以使用属性。The property can be used to determine whether the check box is selected or to set the property programmatically. 引发事件时值向服务器发送操作之间的更改。The event is raised when the value changes between posts to the server. ## Examples 可实现 。 implements . 下面的代码示例演示如何读取的值属性并响应事件。The following code example demonstrates how to read the value of the property and respond to a event. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Checked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的值，指示是否已选中该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of an control that indicates whether the control is selected.

value.span: 若选定了复选框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes between posts to the server.
